title: gnana svaroopamu
sahitya:
jnAna svarUpamu Anandamayamu

anupallavi

 dInuDakucu hari divya guNambulanu mAnasamanduna mAnaka dalacuTE

caraNam 1

 Aru shatrulanu dUru jEsi paripUrNuDaina puruSOttamu dalacuTE 
ayihita sukhamu layapEkSa lEkanu bAhya vicAramu bAsiyuNDuTE
 
caraNam 2

 dharmArtambulu ghOrakamadilO marmamerigi madhusUdanu dalacuTE 
akhilANDambulu akhila janduvulu akhila rUpamulu hariyaniyeguTE
 
caraNam 3

 antarangamunu harinu dalacucu rAmadAsuDani rajilluTeya
